div.div:
There is a plethora of information that is available
through the website and I hope that you are able to
utilize this website to inform yourself about the many
great things that are happening at our school.
Read more

td.a: Merchantville School's No Place for Hate Initiative
td.br: Merchantville School has been designated a "No Place for Hate" School. Throughout the 2018-2019 school year, we completed multiple projects and educated our students on the importance of being "No Place For Hate". Our goal is to provide all students with a positive school climate. Read the No Place for Hate Pledge and about our commitment to a positive school climate.
Mrs. Rachel Spahr - Anti Bullying Specialist & Mrs. Kim Klaus - Anti Bullying Coordinator Phone Number 856-663-1091
